text.div:
This code system https://i-tech-uw.github.io/openelis-global2-fhir-ig/codesystem-task-intent defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
order OrderThe request represents a request/demand and authorization for action by a Practitioner.
original-order Original-OrderThe request represents an original authorization for action.

concept.definition: The request represents a request/demand and authorization for action by a Practitioner.
The request represents an original authorization for action.
